entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
